title: Final Exit (Christian Movie)
description:
Final Exit (Christian Movie)

One of the greatest gospel based Movies of all times. It conveys the message of the gospel without beating around the bush. And the message is, Our righteousness is like filthy rags before God and hence it can never get us into heaven. Only the blood of Jesus Christ can wipe out all our sins, make us clean and pave our path to heaven. It is only by accepting Jesus Christ as our Savior and following his teachings can we be guaranteed of a place in heaven.

A Nobel Peace Prize winner, a convicted murderer, and two professing Christian teenagers are being escorted to judgment. Who will spend eternity in heaven? This evangelistic drama will confront your viewers with life&#039;s most important choice.
